name: Radar (GrIce)
description:
Radar is a small tech demo of a light platform, in which you see only with ecolocation, it was done to explore how a player interacts with the obscure world around him.

Commands:

  • WASD to move
  • F to cast the radar
  • E to interact with the objects
  • Space to jump (when unlocked)
  • Shift to run (when unlocked)
  • Z to suicide

Notes
The game is missing an exit or a pause menu, to close it you will need to manually shut it down.
